title: Why do Jisoo Blackpink and Jennie Blackpink do not bleach their hair? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because they usually wear wigs or dye their hair to a darker color, so there’s no reason for them to bleach it. Rosé and Lisa bleached their hair because Rosé used to have red hair but she changed it to blonde so she didn’t bleached her hair to dye it to the cotton candy color. Lisa didn’t bleached her hair also because she had a brown, kind of blonde hair color and she can just dye through it like Rosé. I can get you a picture of them in different hair colors just click more.  I couldn’t find a picture of Jennie like this :< Couldn’t find a picture of Jisoo like the one on Lisa.:< Imma just type what hair colors she used to have and now. Jisoo changed the color of her brown hair into black then she got red hair…? And then she got a purple kinda color hair and then she remains brown. Sorry couldn’t find a picture for Rosé. Imma just type it in rose used to have black hair and then red and then pink and then blonde and then the cotton candy color.

Although they don't bleach their hair as much as Rosé and Lisa, they still do. Jisoo with Brown hair  Black (Her natural hair is Black. But the stylists have put a bit of dye through it to make the colour look fuller).  Purple  Red  Although, Jennie doesn't bleach very ber hair bright colours. She used to, but not anymore and she use to bleach it and use coloured hair extensions during her trainee dyes. Extensions (You can see her natural hair colour here and that the extensions have been added around the back).  Her natural hair, with a bit of light brown dyed through it.  Her natural hair.  A lighter brown mixed through.  Now here are the much brighter colours she had dyed her hair. This mixed colour  A bit of hair chalk here  Dark green  And finally White  *I found more photos, but couldn't upload them* Anyway, I hope this answered you question and thank you for reading.
